dublin_core.dcvalue: A multi-faceted ICT project that includes SMS campaign sensitizing communities about maternal and child health issues, SMS messages from UNHCO to collect feedback on health service delivery and SMS reminders to pregnant women about antenatal care appointments.
Reduction of Maternal Mortality Through ICT
CHW, facility-based health worker, nurse, patient, community member
Esther Nalugya, Program Officer, UNHCO, Email: enalugya@unhco.or.ug | Hilde Eugelink, SDU Health Coordinator, IICD, Email: heugelink@iicd.org
Connect4Change partners: Cordaid, IICD, Text to Change
Reduction of Maternal Mortality through ICT
Client education and behavior change communication, Data collection and reporting, Maternal Health, Child Health
